content.text: You are a bank robber on your first mission.
You walk into a bank.
You pull out your weapon at the bank teller.
Your weapon of choice is a:
The security guard tackles you and causes you to drop the knife.
The bank teller calls the police.
You are arrested.
The bank teller freezes when he spots the weapon.
You calmly slide a piece of paper through the window, requesting $50,000 in cash.
The bank teller kneels down behind the counter.
An alarm is sounded, alerting the entire bank that an emergency has taken place.
You:

options.option: Raise your weapon at a patron

content.text: You escape to your hideout.
Your boss is not happy with your failure.
Your boss executes you on the spot as an example.
You threaten to kill the man if your demands are not met.
The bank teller complies.
The bank teller places bundles of cash into a paper bag and slides it through the gap of the window.
You take the bag and leave the scene.
Your getaway car is parked at the entrance.
You board the car and start driving.
You can hear police sirens coming from behind you.
You turn
There is roadwork on this street and you are forced to slow down.
The police catch up with you.
You are arrested.
You speed through the empty streets.
Suddenly, you realize that the car is running out of gas.
You ditch the car.
You:
You leave the car.
You run to a parked car on the streets.
The doors are locked.
You spot another car across the street.
You run towards it.
You are hit by another incoming car as you cross the road.
You are killed on the spot.
You enter a supermarket.
Due to the amount of people, you blend into the crowd.
You stay for a while.
You escape the police.
You return to your hideout.
Your boss commends your work.
Your boss takes the paper bag filled with cash.
You are shot in the back.
